FILE: cm210731v11.0.txt
DYAD: NETHERLANDS - N. KOREA
RIVALRY: RIV502
DISPUTE(S): MID51 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20170808
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20170809

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID51 

TERRMID: MID51 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID51 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID51 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID51 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID51 from cm narrative, this MID is the Korean War. UN/NATO forces, including Netherlands, fought along with the South Koreans, and China fought along with the North Koreans. North and South Korea were engaged in a territorial dispute in the Korean War, and UN's support for South Korea led them to fight directly, triggering this MID between them. Coded third party link to territorial MID because the territorial dispute in Korea led these countries to be involved in this MID. 

MARITMID: MID51 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID51 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID51 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID51 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID51 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID51 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID51 from cm narrative, The Netherlands, as part of UN forces, intervened in the Korean War to assist South Korea and prevent the communists in the North from taking control of the peninsula. This war has a civil war element, as the primary disputants were Koreans who were divided along nationalist vs communist lines. Coded civil war MID because the civil war was within this dyad, and led to UN intervention and the triggering of the MID between Netherlands and North Korea here. 

CIVWARLINK: MID51 1 -- civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID51 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: MID51 is the Korean War, which has a civil war element. Coded civil war link because the civil conflict is present in South Korea also, outside of this dyad. 

COUPMID: MID51 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID51 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID51 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID51 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES-CR:
